title: Lorien Is Most Welcome (4U77)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot 3 Elves. Plays to your support area. Each wounded minion loses all damage bonuses. Discard this condition during the regroup phase.
Lore:	”'We are proud to fight alongside Men once more….'”
Rarity:	U
